{{Wired embedded system |brand=Gateworks |model=Avila GW2345 |revision=E |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |availability=uncommon |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=6-28 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425;GWIXP425BDT; |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128J3D75 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron Technology |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, CompactFlash, |expansion_minipci_num=4 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995MA |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Serial EEPROM (8-Kbit);Atmel;AT24C08AN;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Intersil;ICL32231IV;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor and Single Channel ADC;Analog Devices;AD7418;;1;,,, Low Voltage Serial Timekeeping Chip;Dallas Semiconductor;DS1672;;1;,,, 33MHz SMD Crystal Oscillator;Suntsu Frequency Control;SOCB48;;1;,,, 25MHz SMD Crystal Oscillator;Suntsu Frequency Control;SOCB48;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Texas Instruments;LM1086;;1;,,, Low drop positive voltage regulator;STMicroelectronics;LD1117;;1;,,, Dual 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6982S;;2;,,, Dual, 550kHz, 2-Phase Synchronous Regulator;Linear Technology;LTC3728L;;1;,,, 3.3V High-speed Non-inverting Clock Buffer;Pericom Semiconductor;PI49FCT3803;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, Micro USB, |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 }}
